plot: An 8-year-old boy sets his imagination free to decide which to he must buy - El Santo or Spider. After a hard fight, El Santo wins and he takes him home, only to find out that the fight goes on.
title: La Lucha Sigue
plot_es: An 8-year-old boy sets his imagination free to decide which to he must buy - El Santo or Spider. After a hard fight, El Santo wins and he takes him home, only to find out that the fight goes on.
plot_en: An 8-year-old boy sets his imagination free to decide which to he must buy - El Santo or Spider. After a hard fight, El Santo wins and he takes him home, only to find out that the fight goes on.
